name: Stream Processing Plugin
description: This is a external store synchronizer, it posts topics via some streaming tool.

configStructure.name: schematicVersion
configStructure.description: Specify the type and version to be used.

configStructure.name: syntacticVersion
configStructure.description: Specify the type and version to be used for output.

configStructure.name: deliveryUrl
configStructure.discription: Host IP address or name: for stream processing server.
configStructure.regexMessage: Name can only contain digits, latin characters, slash, dot, hyphen and underscore!
configStructure.description: What is the ip address or name of the zookeeper host.

configStructure.name: deliveryType
configStructure.description: Which delivery mechanism? kafka or dummy?

configStructure.name: grainSize
configStructure.description: how fine should the commits be?
